abstract: Perform fast Fourier transforms out of place on 1D complex data.
overview:
## Overview

The functions in this group use the following operation for a complex-to-complex transform:

The temporary buffer versions perform the same operation but use a temporary buffer for improved performance.

items.description: Computes a forward or inverse out-of-place, single-precision complex FFT.
items.name: vDSP_fft_zop

items.description: Computes a forward or inverse out-of-place, double-precision complex FFT.
items.name: vDSP_fft_zopD

items.description: Computes a forward or inverse out-of-place, single-precision complex FFT using a temporary buffer.
items.name: vDSP_fft_zopt

items.description: Computes a forward or inverse out-of-place, double-precision complex FFT using a temporary buffer.
items.name: vDSP_fft_zoptD

sections.title: Out-of-Place FFT Functions with Temporary Buffer

items.description: Performs a 16-element FFT on interleaved-complex data.
items.name: vDSP_FFT16_copv

items.description: Performs a 32-element FFT on interleaved-complex data.
items.name: vDSP_FFT32_copv

items.description: Performs a 16-element FFT on split-complex data.
items.name: vDSP_FFT16_zopv

items.description: Performs a 32-element FFT on split-complex data.
items.name: vDSP_FFT32_zopv

items.description: Computes a single-precision out-of-place radix-3 complex FFT, either forward or inverse.
items.name: vDSP_fft3_zop

items.description: Computes a double-precision out-of-place radix-3 complex FFT, either forward or inverse.
items.name: vDSP_fft3_zopD

items.description: Computes a single-precision out-of-place radix-5 complex FFT, either forward or inverse.
items.name: vDSP_fft5_zop

items.description: Computes a double-precision out-of-place radix-5 complex FFT, either forward or inverse.
items.name: vDSP_fft5_zopD

items.description: Perform fast Fourier transforms in place on 1D complex data.
items.name: In-Place Functions for 1D Complex FFT

title: Out-of-Place Functions for 1D Complex FFT
